name: Daniel Azuma
body:
### Projects:

* [activerecord-mysql2spatial-adapter](http://dazuma.github.com/activerecord-mysql2spatial-adapter): ActiveRecord adapter for MySQL spatial extensions
* [activerecord-postgis-adapter](http://dazuma.github.com/activerecord-postgis-adapter): ActiveRecord adapter for PostGIS
* [activerecord-spatialite-adapter](http://dazuma.github.com/activerecord-spatialite-adapter): ActiveRecord adapter for Spatialite
* [Blockenspiel](http://dazuma.github.com/blockenspiel): DSL block helper for Ruby
* [RGeo](http://dazuma.github.com/rgeo): Geospatial data types for Ruby
* [RGeo::ActiveRecord](http://dazuma.github.com/rgeo-activerecord): Tools for RGeo integration with ActiveRecord
* [RGeo::GeoJSON](http://dazuma.github.com/rgeo-geojson): GeoJSON formatting and parsing in Ruby
* [RGeo::Shapefile](http://dazuma.github.com/rgeo-shapefile): Reader for ESRI Shapefiles in Ruby
* [Sawmill](http://dazuma.github.com/sawmill): Extended logger for Ruby designed to make log analysis easier
* [Versionomy](http://dazuma.github.com/versionomy): Version number class for Ruby

### Also:

* Visit my home page at [daniel-azuma.com](http://daniel-azuma.com/).
* Follow me on Twitter at [@danielazuma](http://twitter.com/danielazuma).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
